monsters.name: Bigfoot
monsters.description: A large, ape-like creature said to inhabit forests.

monsters.name: Chupacabra
monsters.description: A creature reported to drink the blood of livestock, primarily goats.

monsters.name: Mothman
monsters.description: A winged humanoid with glowing red eyes.

monsters.name: Wendigo
monsters.description: A malevolent spirit or monster associated with cannibalism and winter.

monsters.name: Jersey Devil
monsters.description: A kangaroo-like creature with a horse's head, bat wings, and horns.

monsters.name: Mapinguari
monsters.description: A large, hairy, one-eyed monster.

monsters.name: La Llorona
monsters.description: A ghostly woman who mourns her drowned children.

monsters.name: El Pombero
monsters.description: A small, humanoid creature known for its mischievous behavior.
monsters.invoqueInstructions: Offer tobacco and alcohol to appease.

monsters.name: Encantado
monsters.description: A shapeshifting dolphin-like creature, often appearing as a human.

monsters.name: Chullachaqui
monsters.description: A mythical forest creature that can change shape.

monsters.name: Loch Ness Monster
monsters.description: A large aquatic creature.

monsters.name: Kraken
monsters.description: A gigantic sea monster.

monsters.name: Banshee
monsters.description: A spirit known for its wailing that foretells death.

monsters.name: Black Shuck
monsters.description: A ghostly black dog seen as an omen of death.

monsters.name: Alp
monsters.description: A nightmare creature that brings bad dreams.
monsters.invoqueInstructions: Place a broom under your pillow to keep it away.

monsters.name: Mokele-Mbembe
monsters.description: A dinosaur-like creature.

monsters.name: Grootslang
monsters.description: A monster that is part snake, part elephant.

monsters.name: Tokoloshe
monsters.description: A small, hairy creature known for its mischievous and malevolent behavior.
monsters.invoqueInstructions: Raise your bed on bricks to keep it away.

monsters.name: Kongamato
monsters.description: A pterosaur-like creature.

monsters.name: Adze
monsters.description: A vampiric creature that can shape-shift into a firefly.

monsters.name: Yeti
monsters.description: A large, ape-like creature.

monsters.name: Ahool
monsters.description: A giant bat-like or flying primate creature.

monsters.name: Kappa
monsters.description: A water-dwelling creature with a water-filled depression on its head.
monsters.invoqueInstructions: Bow deeply to make it spill the water on its head.

monsters.name: Mongolian Death Worm
monsters.description: A worm-like creature capable of spewing acid or generating electric shocks.

monsters.name: Manananggal
monsters.description: A vampire-like creature that can sever its upper body and grow wings to fly at night.
monsters.invoqueInstructions: Use garlic, salt, or holy water to repel it.

monsters.name: Bunyip
monsters.description: A creature said to lurk in swamps, billabongs, and waterholes.

monsters.name: Yowie
monsters.description: A large, ape-like creature similar to Bigfoot.

monsters.name: Megalania
monsters.description: A giant lizard thought to have existed; some believe it may still live in remote areas.

monsters.name: Menehune
monsters.description: Small, dwarf-like people said to live in forests and mountains.

monsters.name: Taniwha
monsters.description: Mythical sea monsters, often guardians of bodies of water or landforms.
